# Document Templates

This directory contains standardized templates for project documentation.

## Available Templates

| Template | Purpose | When to Use |
|----------|---------|-------------|
| [SRS Template](srs-template.md) | Software Requirements Specification | Documenting detailed requirements for a subsystem |
| [Design Document](design-doc-template.md) | Technical design and architecture | Before implementing a major feature or subsystem |
| [Test Plan](test-plan-template.md) | Test strategy and test cases | Before beginning a test campaign |
| [Test Report](test-report-template.md) | Test execution results | After completing a test campaign |
| [User Manual](user-manual-template.md) | End-user operating procedures | For operator-facing documentation |
| [API Reference](api-doc-template.md) | API documentation | For module interfaces and public APIs |

## Usage

1. Copy the template to the appropriate location
2. Fill in all sections (remove placeholder text)
3. Submit via PR with the relevant code changes
